plugin.name: AACplus

plugin.name: FindArt
plugin.title: FindArt
plugin.desc: FindArt plugins provides easy way for user to locate and download cover art from Amazon. All processing is within SqueezeCenter plugin. It is not a bulk coverart application. Ver 2.0 has the following * Find Cover Art menu off Track Info page while browsing library - no longer limited to use only on playing track. * Find Art now works on Controller from Track Info displays. * Search related Find Art settings can be changed from Settings menu on Controller. * Find Art menu position on Track Info page is configurable (top,bottom,auto) * A preference setting to display a Custom Search facility on WebUI where user can change the search terms. * New artwork will show up quicker on WebUI and controller without need for rescan. Caching in Controller and WebUI sometimes prevents updated art being displayed immediately. Restarting the controller or clearing the browser cache (on Firefox under Clear Private Data) will generally enable updated art to be views. * fix for bug when search Title has accented characters.
plugin.creator: bpa

plugin.name: NPRRadio
plugin.title: NPR Radio
plugin.desc: NPR Plugin to make it easy to find and play popular NPR prgrams. A plugin also makes it easier to listen to complete NPR Radio. Each program menu (e.g. Morning Edition, All things considered etc.) will list the program sgements which can be played separately. For each program, there is a "play all items" which will create a playlist of all the segments in the program. v1.02 adds the following * Support for American routes * menu item for additional podcasts * where possible NPR or similar icons displayed in Now Playing
plugin.creator: bpa

plugin.name: CDplayer
plugin.title: CDplayer
plugin.desc: A Plugin to enable an audio CD in the PC CD drive to be played through SqueezeCenter. Requires CDDA2WAV to be installed.
plugin.creator: bpa
plugin.changes: - Limit imposed on CDD2WAV output in case of unexpected behaviour.

plugin.name: CDplayer
plugin.title: CDplayer
plugin.desc: A Plugin to enable an audio CD in the PC CD drive to be played through SqueezeCenter. Includes CDDA2WAV and associated DLLs.
plugin.creator: bpa
plugin.changes: - Limit imposed on CDD2WAV output in case of unexpected behaviour.

plugin.name: CDplayer
plugin.title: CDplayer
plugin.desc: A Plugin to enable an audio CD in the PC CD drive to be played through SqueezeCenter. Requires CDDA2WAV to be installed. Use icedax for Ubuntu.
plugin.creator: bpa
plugin.changes: - On Linux status of CD tray is checked before trying to read. - Limit imposed on CDD2WAV output in case of unexpected behaviour.

plugin.name: WaveInput
plugin.title: WaveInput
plugin.desc: A Plugin to enable Windows PC audio to be captured and played through SqueezeCenter
plugin.creator: Joe Bryan updated by bpa

plugin.name: WaveInput
plugin.title: WaveInput
plugin.desc: A Plugin to enable Linux PC audio to be captured and played through SqueezeCenter. Default setup uses ALSA but OSS also works.
plugin.creator: bpa

plugin.name: TunerPlay
plugin.title: TunerPlay
plugin.desc: A Plugin to enable a Analog TV/FM Tuner cards to be tuned and play FM stations through SC. Require VLC ( http://www.videolan.org/vlc/download-windows.html ) to be installed
